sentences.en: An egoist is a person who is his own best friend.
sentences.cn: 自负的人是自己最好的朋友.

sentences.en: And so a hyper-inflated egoist from hyper-INFERIORITY Complex issue book after book to show cause of its LKYism wiseDOOM!
sentences.cn: 一堆极度自卑的复杂问题产生了这么一个极度膨胀的利己主义者，显示出了其李光耀主义的智慧。

sentences.en: I never thought of myself as a bastard, an egoist .
sentences.cn: 我从没想过我自己是个杂种， 利己主义者。

sentences.en: John is such an egoist that he only cares about himself.
sentences.cn: 约翰过于自我,只在乎自己.

sentences.en: My enemies - and some of my friends - have calld me an egoist - So other friends and enemies tell me.
sentences.cn: 我的仇敌 —— 还有一些朋友 —— 曾说我 孤芳自赏,自高自大,别的朋友和仇敌也这么说.

sentences.en: My enemies - and some of my friends - have called me an egoist - So other friends and enemies tell me.
sentences.cn: 我的仇敌 ― ―还有一些朋友 ― ―曾说我 孤芳自赏,自高自大,别的朋友和仇敌也这么说.

sentences.en: The other always sees that you are an egoist.
sentences.cn: 另一方总是看见你是个自我中心者.

sentences.en: When you're an egoist, none of the harm you do is intentional.
sentences.cn: 当你是个利己主义者时, 你做的任何伤害都不是故意的.

words.tran_cn: 自私自利的，自我中心的
自私自利的；自我中心的；利已主义的
自我主义者；利己主义者

trans.tran_cn: 利己主义者，自我主义者
